title: Understanding Research Design
text: Research design is a framework or blueprint for conducting the research project. It details the procedures necessary for obtaining the information needed to structure or solve research problems.

title: Identifying Key Components
text: Consider what makes a research design effective. It should provide a clear plan for how the research will be conducted, including the methods used to gather and analyze data. What component is crucial for this planning?

title: Defining Variables
text: Which option guides the research process and ensures that the study can be replicated and validated?
